Tender Title: ITS200390 Children's Centre Nursery Management Software Solution
Tender Description:
Further information on the opportunity and expressions of interest should be made on the Yorkshire and Humber Procurement Portal, Yortender, at www.yortender.co.uk.
If you have not previously done so, please register on the above website.
Once your registration has been accepted, you should log-in and Search using the project ID "DN460065" or project description "ITS200390 Children's Centre Nursery Management Software Solution."
Once you have registered for the opportunity, accessing it and selecting "Start" on the second event will provide access to the Invitation to Tender documents.
Any queries you may have must be made using the messaging facility available against the opportunity.

Help with the Yortender website can be obtained from the Due North support team by email to ProContractSuppliers@proactis.com.                                                                                                                                                                     To procure a Children's Centre Nursery Management Software Solution for use in the Council's 29 Children's Centres which will provide:
• a more simplified and streamlined process for the booking and management of Children's Centre placements;
• a reduction in administration time which will help the Council make more effective use of its resources;
• to improve the availability and scope of management information which can then be used to support the decision making process and strategic management of the business.

Further information on this opportunity and application for inclusion in the tender must be made via the YORtender procurement portal, at www.yortender.co.uk.  If you have not previously done so, please register. Once your registration has been approved, you should log-in and Search using the project reference - DN476680.                                                                                                                                                          Any issues accessing the portal should be reported to ProContractSuppliers@proactis.com.                                                                       The Council is seeking to procure and contract for an Automated Invoice Processing Solution ("the Solution"), comprising the provision of Scanning Services ("the Services") together with a cloud based software system ("the System") to facilitate Automated Invoice Processing.  The Council is seeking to appoint a suitably experienced and qualified Contractor to work in partnership to drive process efficiencies and cost savings within its accounts payable process through the digitised capture and management of its supplier invoices.
